titles.title: Child Safety and Home Security Act of 2003

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for a nonrefundable tax credit against income tax for individuals who purchase a residential safe storage device for the safe storage of firearms.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/8/2003--Introduced. Child Safety and Home Security Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide for a nonrefundable tax credit for the purchase of a residential safe storage device that is put into service for the securing of firearms.Prohibits the creation of a database identifying gun owners using information from tax returns on which credit under this Act is claimed.
